TopicTitle: Structural failure following time warp exit or switching vessels

Articles.Content:
I have a some stuff on the Mun which has been fine for a long time but now I'm finding that when I exit timewarp or switch vessels, some of the vehicles buck like a bronco and this sometimes causes structural failure of one particularly vulnerable vehicle (an engine clips into a wheel very slightly). I uninstalled all my mods to check whether they were the cause and the problem remains. Here's a video demonstration:

https://youtu.be/4kf2MbrMtX4

The save file is here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/pkllrsfju07y8if/Bronco.sfs?dl=0

It can be resolved by releasing the claw from the end vessel with the mining drills and then reattaching.
